text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh nooo, I'm so scared! The results<n>for the initial screening
will be out<n>soon!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
C-c-calm down! At times like this, you<n>should just imagine
you're a<n>princess! And a princess never fails!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Goodness, you two... Panicking isn't<n>going to change the
results.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
She's right. We have to stay in<n>buono, buono spirits! ♪ Why
don't we<n>have something sweet to calm us<n>down?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh, I think the results have arrived.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Let's open them on the count of<n>three, everyone! One...
two...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Yay, we did it! We all passed the<n>screening! ♪

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That just leaves the audition. Its<n>details are kept secret
each year, so<n>it'll be difficult to prepare for.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it just says, "The meeting<n>location is Beauty Island.
Please come<n>wearing a tracksuit!" What're we<n>supposed
to do with just that?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Beauty Island? If my princess<n>intuition is on the mark, it
must be a<n>high-class holiday resort! ♪

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
There will be a fabulous castle-like<n>hotel, a private beach for
VIPs, and<n>maybe the chance to meet an<n>incognito prince...
It's going to be<n>amazing!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
...I don't think there'll be any princes<n>at the audition.
Probably not, anyway.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text: Oh! You passed the initial screening?!<n>Congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
I expected no less from my wonderful<n>daughter. ♪ I just
know you'll pass<n>the audition with flying colors too!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Mother. Also, about the<n>thing I asked for...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
You mean the photo of me in my<n>racewear? Of course I still
have it! I'll<n>send it to you after I hang up. ♪

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yes, it's exactly how I remember<n>it. It sure takes me
back.

text_block_list.name: Young Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Your racewear for the<n>Japanese Oaks is so pretty,
Mother!

text_block_list.name: Young Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's so sparkly and dazzling, just like<n>a wedding dress!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. ♪ It's a one-of-a-kind outfit<n>created for me by a
first-rate designer!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
This magical outfit makes me the star<n>of every race and
concert I'm in. I<n>mesmerize everyone who sees me! ♪

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
If you follow in my footsteps, there<n>might come a time when
you wear an<n>outfit that's just as wonderful.

text_block_list.name: Young Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Really?! Then when I grow up—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ah... Air Groove!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Oh, Dober... What's the matter?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...Um, I just wanted to say thank you<n>again!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I was only able to enter the audition<n>because you pushed
me to do it.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You don't need to thank me. I just<n>told you the truth... that
you're worthy<n>of recognition.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That may be so, but thank you<n>anyway.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
We'll be rivals at the audition, so<n>don't expect me to go
easy on you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I won't!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, on the day of the audition...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Whaaa?! Beauty Island isn't a<n>resort?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I never would've expected this! I<n>wonder if this means Ms.
Beauty's<n>more focused on a candidate's spirit<n>than their
charisma.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
We'll be fine! Every one of you is<n>super skilled and spirited,
so I'm sure<n>we'll all do amazingly! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What's that sound? Is that a<n>helicopter?

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Bonjour! ☆ I'm the world-famous<n>racewear designer,
Beauty<n>Anshinzawa! ♪

text_block_list.name: Participants
text_block_list.text: Aaah! It's really her!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. ♪ Merci beaucoup for the warm<n>welcome! Now, let
me explain what<n>your task is.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: To me, an Umamusume encounteringher racewear is like a date withdestiny, and their bond is like an engagement!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
That's why the outfits I create are<n>aaall modeled after
wedding dresses.<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
What do you think of when you hear<n>the word "wedding"?
Why, a chapel of<n>course!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Your challenge today will be a gameof speed and survival. You mustmake it to that chapel across the waybefore anyone else. ♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Those who can overcome the<n>challenge while radiating
beauty will<n>be rewarded with the chance to tell<n>me what
racewear means to them<n>with a beautiful proposal!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
You pass if your vow sparks<n>something within me! Those
selected<n>will be the muses who will run in the<n>unveiling
race to showcase my<n>designs.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
While my job is to create racewear<n>for my muses, it's my
muses' job to<n>showcase the beauty of my creations<n>
during the race! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Copy that! ☆ I don't really understand<n>what's going on, but
we just gotta<n>reach that chapel up there, right?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
(Proposal aside, it's not going to be<n>easy to traverse this
wild terrain...)

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Now! Without further ado, let us<n>commence the Beauty
Dream Cup<n>model audition! Show me your<n>brilliance! ☆

text_block_list.name: Participant A
text_block_list.text: Eeeek! What's this giant boulder<n>doing here?!

text_block_list.name: Participant B
text_block_list.text: Aaah! Get away from me!

text_block_list.name: Participant C
text_block_list.text: This is impossible! I'm going home!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Wow! Everyone is doing their best to<n>survive this ordeal! ♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
I wonder what kind of beauty I'll be<n>blessed with this year?
...Hehe, I can't<n>wait to see. ☆
